attributes.action: provide long term funding for a specialized anti-trafficking unit within the UK (starting before april 2009)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Metropolitain Police says it must disband the UK's only anti-trafficking unit due to lack of funding from the Home Office. 
Human Trafficking is the third largest black market industry in the world. As an industrialized country the UK is one of the largest transportation and destination sites for trafficked people in the world. 
International games serve as major trafficking ground, and with no specialized forces in place to combat human trafficking within the UK, the disbanment means four years of planning for international organized crime rings. 

(Feel free to do a google search of: "UK disban anti-trafficking unit")
